subject: Software Simsonn V2.1.3 for pedals Plus
description_text:
Hello, I'm having a problem with the Simsonn software screen where some text isn't displaying. I've already tried finding a light-colored theme for the software, but it wasn't possible. I've also changed the Windows theme to see if that would solve it, but nothing changed. Do you know how I can fix this problem?

[cid:9e6f5d4e-e53a-404b-bc04-4258cabe5483]

[cid:2904697f-182f-4b85-9dc8-7788b9a63d02]

conversations.body_text: Hi Guilherme Secchi,  Could you please provide your order number? Also, what language is your Windows system currently set to (e.g., Chinese / English / French / German, etc.)? I’ll forward this information to our engineer so we can investigate the issue for you.

Hello, I'm not sure of my ticket number because the link sent to my email doesn't open, but I believe it's 11281.

My Windows is set to Portuguese (Brazil).
